alert.note: Alert for Faulk; Hand; Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 06 at 2:02AM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central South Dakota, north central South Dakota and northeast South Dakota, including the following counties, in central South Dakota, Hand. In north central South Dakota, Faulk. In northeast South Dakota, Spink. * WHEN...Until noon CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 302 AM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Redfield, Tulare, Glendale Colony, Frankfort, Spink Colony, Ashton, Athol, Zell, Burdette, Rockham, Cottonwood Lake, Twin Lakes and Miranda. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
